scripts.flowcore:stream: flowcore scenario local -f flowcore.yaml -f flowcore.local.yaml -f flowcore.local.development.yaml -s now -e http://localhost:3000/api/transformer -H "X-Secret: analytics-transformer-secret"
scripts.flowcore:backfill: flowcore scenario local -f flowcore.yaml -f flowcore.local.yaml -f flowcore.local.development.yaml -z 5 -e http://localhost:3000/api/transformer -H "X-Secret: analytics-transformer-secret"
